Author: distracted_tatertot
Text: Also, I'd like to get into a workout routine again so that I can tone up and feel better about myself, but I have almost no energy. The fatigue is so bad that I had to get labs taken to find out the cause , and I got the results back today: I have anemia and a vitamin D deficiency. It explains a lot, but the supplements I have to take will take a while to kick in and I'd like to start exercising sooner rather than later.  &#x200B;  UGH. I'm so frustrated.
